message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering it's worth $8,000 to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $11,000 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer for now.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,000 is still too high for me.  I'm really looking to get this product for as close to $9,000 as possible. I'm willing to go to $9,500 if it makes this work for you.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our previous offers, so I'll counter with $10,500. This is my best offer for now.
